snippet: Eleh, as he is called, played a show of electronic compositions in Brooklyn Heights.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by electronic musician Eleh at Our Lady of Lebanon Cathedral as part of the Touch.30 festival presented by Issue Project Room.
lead_paragraph: Eleh, as he is called, played a show of electronic compositions in Brooklyn Heights.

headline.seo: Eleh at Our Lady of Lebanon Cathedral in Brooklyn Heights
headline.main: In a Dark Church, Nuances of Sound Turn Symphonic
headline.print_headline: In a Dark Church, Nuances Of Sound Turn Symphonic
